Key Match Events: Alex Skenes allowed three runs (two earned) with six strikeouts over five solid innings
Chicago Cubs scored 11 runs in the ninth inning to take a 14-10 lead
Pittsburgh Pirates had a 10-3 lead through six innings
David Bednar blew his sixth save of the season, allowing two runs and loading the bases
Post-Match Reflections: The manager expressed frustration and emphasized the need for better execution at the end of games
Players emphasized sticking together as a team and playing for each other
